data.message: I have no idea who I'm writing but can't find what I thought I was looking for. I just want to add my middle name to my Facebook name. HOW do I do that? Anybody got suggestions.

replies.message: Hi Sher. To help make sure everyone uses their authentic name, you can only change your name every 60 days. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2hwb0CQ. -Jessica

Facebook I have a lot of family on Facebook and I think a lot of them don't know who the hell I am because I've been ill a lot  and missed seeing a lot of them grow up so I just want to add my maiden  name and then married name so they'll maybe figure out who I am.  I use my nickname for everything and everybody. I haven't a scanner (broke down) but  how I can give you my 'legal' name for legal 'stuff.'  Actually my nickname was shortened for this and other groups I belong to because some people us it and some use the rrie behind it. Now I've confused the hell out of myself!
